name: DirectoryEngine Counter
author: Nguyen Van Duoc

sections.description:
The feature displays the view count is not yet a reality in DirectoryEngine theme – a theme of EngineTheme. In the meantime, this plugin will help you to do that.

After installing the plugin, you will see in your theme to add some view appears in the right-bottom corner of place item ( in place list ).

This plugin does not create metadata for the post, but it will create a new table in your database, and saved views in this view. This is a good solution for the future development. When we can save many more metadata.

Demo : Địa Điểm Phật Giáo

Usage

For current version of theme, you have to open file in DirectoryEngine theme then :

  • To display view count : using do_action(‘de_show_view_count’);
  • To increase view couint : using do_action(‘de_increase_view_count’);

Cộng đồng wordpress Việt Nam

  • WordPress Kite
  • Sen Việt
  • Facebook page
  • Google plus

Cộng đồng wordpress Việt Nam

Hãy tham gia cộng đồng wordpress Việt Nam để cùng chia sẻ kiến thức, kinh nghiệm về lập trình

Cộng đồng wordpress Việt Nam

  • WordPress Kite
  • Sen Việt
  • Facebook page
  • Google plus

short_description: This plugin helps you to track and display the view count of the place.
